page.title: 14CLUBS AND ORGANIZATIONS
page.content: There are numerous clubs in this area. There are two branches of the { {Round Table}which support local charities. The main fund-raising events being a{Grand Firework Display} and a {Summer Carnival. The{Rotary club}is a group of local businessmen comprising one representative for each profession and devoted to supporting local charities. The{Shenfield, Hutton and Brentwood } {Leukeamia Research Fund}was founded in {1962}and this year raised{Â£20,000,} {Â£4000}of which came from the annual {Tatoo;}the rest being made up of individual donations, jumblesales, dances and concerts. Most intersets and age groups are represented in the area organizations ranging from the{National Childbirth } {Trust}to the{Forty Plus Cycling Club!}
